attributes.action: Support the right to die with dignity
attributes.additional_details:
Why should people who have a terminal illness made to live the rest of their  life suffering? When pets are sick they get put down out of the pain, why can’t people who have an actual say be the same? Humans shouldn’t have to go on suffering and being in pain it’s immoral, 

Personally I watched Someon I love  suffer in pain with terminal cancer and it taking their life, 
People should have a say when they want to go before they get to the point they can’t hack it anymore
attributes.background: Terminally ill people deserve the right to die on their own terms, but the UK’s current law against assisted dying is forcing thousands to suffer unnecessarily

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222481

We're very sorry for your loss.
